Variable Definition: Federal Provider Number 2022JUN (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/4pq5-n9py)
latitude
longitude
names of the skilled nursing facility 2022JUN (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/4pq5-n9py)
sum of the scope/severity ratings for fire life safety standard deficiencies over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
mean length of time it took to resolve the fire life safety standard deficiencies over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
number of fire life safety codes standard deficiencies over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
number of fire life safety inspections over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/svdt-c123)
number of fire life safety complaints by individuals over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
sum of the  scope/severity ratings for emergency preparedness standard deficiencies over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
mean length of time it took to resolve the emergency preparedness standard deficiencies over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
number of emergency preparedness standard deficiencies over a four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
number of emergency preparedness inspections over a four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/svdt-c123)
number of emergency preparedness complaints by individuals over the four year period (2018-2022) (Source https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/ifjz-ge4w)
